A.name: First Serve
A.discription: Win your first game in the multiplayer mode.

B.name: Perfect Serve
B.discription: Score five aces in a single game.

C.name: Rally Master
C.discription: Complete a rally of 20 or more hits in a single point.

D.name: Speed Demon
D.discription: Score a point with a shot that exceeds a certain speed (e.g., 100 mph).

E.name: Accuracy Ace
E.discription: Win a game without missing a single shot.

F.name: Shutout
F.discription: Win a game with a score of 11-0.

J.name: Comeback Kid
J.discription: Win a game after trailing by a certain number of points (e.g., 5-10).

H.name: Win Streak
H.discription: Win five games in a row in multiplayer mode.

I.name: Top Spin
I.discription: Use topspin to score points in a game.

G.name: Underdog Victory
G.discription: Win a game against a player with a higher rank.

K.name: Tournament Champion
K.discription: Win a specific number of tournaments in a row.

L.name: Quick Reflexes
L.discription: Score a point within the first five seconds of a game.

M.name: Ball Control
M.discription: Win a game without letting the ball touch the net.

N.name: Spin Doctor
N.discription: Score points using a variety of spin shots in a single game.

O.name: Online Rivalry
O.discription: Defeat the same player multiple times in online matches.
